page.title: 07Housing
page.content: The only Public house within this square B2 is situated behind the parade of shops, there is also a small social club behind this.Between the old railway line and the houses, there is a playing field and an area designated for allotments. Ther is also a council run Old peoples home situated here.The privately owned houses are in general fairly sub stantial.New four bedroomed houses with two bathrooms, three reception rooms, large kitchen and utility area cost about Â£104,000. A small number of large private residence follow a linear pattern along the main road, which cuts across the rural sector. this part has small pockets of decicuous and coniferous woodland.Ther are a numberof public footpaths through these wooded areas. A disused tip is bordered by a stream.
